Talk_6001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>A wanderer type, huh? And here I thought
you were up to no good.
Talk_7000: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_01>Thanks for taking time to water my babies.
Talk_6002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh. It's just you. You've got to stop doing
that to me.
Talk_7001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, you might think you can never get
too much water. <sp:5:1:0>But they've had plenty.<sp:0:4:0>If you're hopin' to get the <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>
to grow quicker, why not pick some up at
the general store?
Talk_7002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But they're full up on rain, so that's
enough water for now.<sp:0:4:0>If you're hopin' to get the <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>
to grow quicker, why not pick some up at
the general store?
Talk_4001: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh? Well, all right, then. See ya.
Talk_5000: You shouldn't take any without asking.
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I don't know if you're visiting for the
veggies or for Cece, but I hope you had
some reason to come all the way here.<sp:0:4:0>Well, while you're here, I hope you don't
pass up the chance to eat a few of our
<clr:0000>famous vegetables<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Down at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>, they got
'em all lined up. You can't miss 'em.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Start with the <clr:0000>Hylian tomato<clr:ffff>. Trust me.<sp:0:4:0>I know they're good, because I put lots of
love into raising 'em!
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It doesn't really matter whether you came
for the veggies or for Cece.<sp:0:4:0>So long as you're here, I hope you don't
pass up the chance to eat a few of our
<clr:0000>famous vegetables<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Down at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>, they got
'em all lined up. You can't miss 'em.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Start with the <clr:0000>Hylian tomato<clr:ffff>. Trust me.<sp:0:4:0>I know they're good, because I put lots of
love into raising 'em!
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you want to know all about our village's
signature crops, go to the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>.
They've got 'em all lined up there.<sp:0:4:0>Start with the <clr:0000>Hylian tomato<clr:ffff>. Trust me.<sp:0:4:0>I'm proud of how they turned out.
I'd love it if you bought just one and
gave it a taste.
Talk_2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Have you tried a <clr:0000>Hylian tomato<clr:ffff> yet?<sp:0:4:0>It doesn't really matter whether you came
for the veggies or for Cece.<sp:0:4:0>You shouldn't pass up the chance to have
some of our vegetables while you're here.<sp:0:4:0>Down at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>, they have
all the village's <clr:0000>specialty goods<clr:ffff> lined up.
You can't miss 'em.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, I'd better be going. My little
girl's waiting for me at home.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Don't mean to be rude since you came up
to say hello, but I've got to be on my way
to see what the rain's doing to my crops.
Talk_2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Even if you hate <clr:0000>tomatoes<clr:ffff>, that's all right.
Make sure you try some of our signature
veggies while you're here in Hateno.<sp:0:4:0>Down at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>, they have
all the village's <clr:0000>specialty goods<clr:ffff> lined up.
You can't miss 'em.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Anyway, I'd better be going. My little
girl's waiting for me at home.
Talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm in a hurry to get home. Don't want to
get stuck out in the rain.<sp:0:4:0>Stop by my field tomorrow, and we can
talk then. See ya!
Talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Are you a traveler or somethin'?<sp:0:4:0>Because you seem to have traveled your
way into my house. The place where I live.
But you're welcome, I suppose.<sp:0:4:0>Visit the <clr:0000>general store <clr:ffff>while you're in
town. They have all the village's <clr:0000>signature
goods<clr:ffff> lined up. Go and take a look.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Especially at the <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>.
Trust me.<sp:0:4:0>Though I hope you'll go past lookin' and
buy one or two.
Talk_2005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I don't know if you came for the veggies
or for Cece, but either way, I'm not sure
what brings you here specifically.<sp:0:4:0>This is my house, y'see. The place where
I live. <sp:5:1:0>Wait a sec...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseL_00>You've got an eye on my land, don't you!
I'll have you know that not just anyone is
fit to work that soil!<sp:0:4:0>Prove to me you can raise <clr:0000>Hylian
tomatoes<clr:ffff> as delicious as mine and
MAYBE I'll think about it. Someday.
Talk_1100:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I don't know if you're visiting for the
veggies or for Cece, but I hope you had
some reason to come all the way here.<sp:0:4:0>Well, while you're here, I hope you don't
pass up the chance to eat a few of our
<clr:0000>famous vegetables<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Down at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>, they got
'em all lined up. You can't miss 'em.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Start with the <clr:0000>Hylian tomato<clr:ffff>. Trust me.<sp:0:4:0>Not much to say about 'em except that
I put a lot of love into growing 'em, and
I'm proud of how they turned out.
Talk_2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the only chance I get to spend
some time with my daughter.<sp:0:4:0>If you need something, come see me next
time I'm out working the field.<sp:0:4:0>You'll know it when you see it. It's the
only one that grows <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1101:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>This <clr:0000>Hylian tomato<clr:ffff>'s looking ripe, eh?<sp:5:0:0>
So juicy, it's about to burst!<sp:0:4:0>This batch'll be ready to sell to the
<clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff> soon. The ones I raise
myself are worth every rupee!
Talk_1102:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>My daughter, Aster, loves these
<clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I'll put in as much as it takes to keep that
darling girl happy.<sp:0:4:0>I always pick out a few to keep just for us
before I sell the rest to the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I shouldn't have to say this, but...stand
out in the rain for too long, and you're
liable to catch something.<sp:0:4:0>Why don't you go rest under the eaves
over there until the rain stops?
Talk_1104:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Hey, I saw that!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>The only one besides me who's allowed
to pick my prize <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff> is my
daughter, Aster.<sp:0:4:0>If you want some, go to the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>
and buy 'em like everyone else.
Talk_1105:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hey now. You've got some nerve.<sp:0:4:0>Didn't I tell you that nobody's allowed to
pick my <clr:0000>Hylian tomatoes<clr:ffff> except my little
girl, Aster?<sp:0:4:0>If you want some, go to the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>
and buy 'em like everyone else.
